title: Pancakes
meta: Mix makes three batches, stores up to 3 months.
directions: To make mix; combine flour, sugar, baking power, baking soda, and salt in a container and shake.
Whisk egg whites, vanilla extract and buttermilk togthere in a small bowl.
Whisk egg yolks with melted butter.
Pour all liquids rendered on top of 2 cups of mix, and whisk togthere.
Keeping a griddle buttered cook at a tad below medium heat, flipping once one side has standing bubbles.
Freeze leftovers by sandwhiching them between towels for a couple hours then transfer to a freezer bag
